definition: Third-party online merchants and their associated transactions, representing external online service providers
Month-to-Date, referring to the time period from the beginning of the current month until the current date
Last Month-to-Date time period representing equivalent timeframe in the previous month for comparison purposes
Total count of unique users who performed transactions in the current month-to-date period
Total count of transactions completed in the current month-to-date period
Total Gross Merchandise Value of all transactions in the current month-to-date period
Transactions Per User calculated as total MTD transactions divided by total MTD users
Total count of unique users who performed transactions in the last month-to-date period
Total count of transactions completed in the last month-to-date period
Total Gross Merchandise Value of all transactions in the last month-to-date period
Transactions Per User for the last month-to-date period calculated as total LMTD transactions divided by total LMTD users
Growth rate of users calculated as (MTD Users / LMTD Users) - 1, representing the percentage change in user count
Growth rate of transactions calculated as (MTD Transactions / LMTD Transactions) - 1, representing the percentage change in transaction count
business_alias: MTD Transaction Growth, Month-to-Date Transaction Growth

definition: Growth rate of Gross Merchandise Value calculated as (MTD GMV / LMTD GMV) - 1, representing the percentage change in GMV
business_alias: Month-to-Date GMV Growth, MTD Gross Merchandise Value Growth

definition: Gross Merchandise Value, the total value of all transactions processed through the platform
Transactions, referring to completed payment or purchase activities on the platform
Count of transactions grouped by payee VPA and merchant name, filtered to only include merchants with more than 100 transactions in the current month
Virtual Payment Address of the payee or merchant receiving the payment in UPI transactions
The business name of the online merchant or service provider in the transaction
The process of associating Virtual Payment Addresses with corresponding merchant information and business details

Unified Payments Interface - India's instant real-time payment system that facilitates inter-bank peer-to-peer and person-to-merchant transactions, enabling instant money transfers and digital payments
Total count of new users acquired in the current Month-to-Date period
Total count of reactivated users (React2Mplus_Users) within the current month-to-date period
Total count of new users acquired in the Last Month-to-Date period for comparison
Total count of reactivated users (React2Mplus) in the Last Month-to-Date period for comparison
Combined total of new users and reactivated users for the current month-to-date period, calculated as SUM(MTD_New_Users) + SUM(MTD_React2Mplus_Users)
Combined total of new users and reactivated users for the last month-to-date period, calculated as SUM(LMTD_New_Users) + SUM(LMTD_React2Mplus_Users)
Growth rate of new users calculated as (MTD New Users / LMTD New Users) - 1, showing percentage change in new user acquisition
Growth rate of reactivated users calculated as (MTD React Users / LMTD React Users) - 1, showing percentage change in user reactivation
Growth rate of combined new and reactivated users comparing current MTD to last MTD, calculated as ((MTD New + React Users) / (LMTD New + React Users)) - 1
Reactivated users who returned after being inactive for 2 months or more
business_alias: Reactivated Users, React2Mplus Users, React2Mplus Users, Reactivated Users

definition: First Time/Repeat Time user classification system used for analyzing user behavior patterns
Third Party - refers to external merchants or partners operating on the platform
Daily Active Users - count of unique users who were active on a specific day
7-day average of Daily Active Users, calculated as the mean DAU over the past 7 days
Yesterday's Daily Active Users count
Growth rate of yesterday's DAU compared to 7-day average DAU, calculated as (Yday DAU / 7d avg DAU) - 1
Monthly Active Users - count of unique users who were active within a month
Last Month-to-Date Monthly Active Users for the equivalent period in the previous month
Month-to-Date Monthly Active Users for the current month period
Growth rate of current month-to-date MAU compared to last month-to-date MAU, calculated as (MTD MAU / LMTD MAU) - 1
7-day average of transaction count, calculated as the mean transactions over the past 7 days
Growth rate of yesterday's transactions compared to 7-day average transactions, calculated as (Yday txns / 7d avg txns) - 1
7-day average of Gross Merchandise Value, calculated as the mean GMV over the past 7 days
Growth rate of yesterday's GMV compared to 7-day average GMV, calculated as (Yday gmv / 7d avg gmv) - 1
Net Revenue - total revenue after deducting costs and fees
7-day average of Net Revenue, calculated as the mean NR over the past 7 days
Growth rate of yesterday's Net Revenue compared to 7-day average NR, calculated as (Yday nr / 7d avg nr) - 1
Growth rate of current month-to-date Net Revenue compared to last month-to-date NR, calculated as (MTD nr / LMTD nr) - 1
Top 1000 merchants ranked by performance metrics such as transaction volume or revenue
Yesterday - metrics from the previous day
Total Monthly Transacting Users across all merchants, representing the sum of all users who made transactions in a given month.
Monthly Transacting Users for merchants classified as 'Live' based on a predefined list of active online merchants including major platforms like Flipkart, Zomato, Swiggy, etc.
Monthly Transacting Users for merchants that are not classified as 'Live' merchants, excluding all Live merchant transactions.
Monthly Transacting Users for the top 15 merchants, which is a subset of Live merchants including major platforms like Meesho, Flipkart, Zomato, Reliance, Myntra, etc.
Monthly Transacting Users - refers to Overall_MTU
Third-party online merchants categorized into Live, Non-Live, and Top 15 segments for transaction user analysis.
Day over Day comparison methodology for measuring short-term performance changes
Total sum of standardized cashburn amounts aggregated over time, representing the monetary value of cashback given to users

Calculated cashback value converted to standard currency based on redemption type: coins divided by 166.67, goldcoins divided by 100, UPI amount plus 0.2478, otherwise original amount. This metric provides the cash equivalent value for different types of cashback redemptions.
Reward system offering cash benefits through various redemption types including coins, goldcoins, and UPI transactions
Classification of how cashback is redeemed including coins, goldcoins, and UPI methods, each with different conversion rates
Status tracking for cashback processing including Given (3), Processing (2), and Pending (1) states
Count of distinct users who have SuperCash transactions in the selected time period
business_alias: Users, Unique Users, Number of Users, User Count

definition: Total sum of cashburn amounts across all transactions, aggregated from individual cashburn calculations
business_alias: Total Cash Burn, Cash Burn Sum, Total Cashburn, Cashburn Sum

definition: UPI SuperCash campaign identifier that groups transactions by specific promotional campaigns and serves as a marketing campaign identifier associated with SuperCash offers and promotions
business_alias: Campaign Name, Promo Campaign, Campaign ID

definition: Current state of SuperCash transaction indicating completion state. Status values include: Given (completed), Processing (in progress), Pending (awaiting fulfillment), and Unscratched (not activated).

Digital wallet platform, service, or payment method associated with SuperCash campaigns and transactions. Encompasses both the wallet provider/service and the specific digital wallet type used for payments.
Calculated cashback amount based on redemption type: coins (amount/166.67), goldcoins (amount/100), UPI (amount+0.2478), or original amount for other types
Status category for cashback that has been successfully delivered to users (status=1, fulfillment_status=3)
Status category for cashback that is currently being processed (status=1, fulfillment_status=2)
Cashback status when status=1 and fulfillment_status=1, indicating cashback is awaiting processing
Status category for scratch cards that have not been scratched by users (status=2, fulfillment_status=1)
Redemption type for cashback where amount is divided by 166.67 to calculate cash burn
Redemption type for cashback where amount is divided by 100 to calculate cash burn
Month-to-date count of unique users who performed transactions on a daily basis
Unique count of user identifiers, representing the number of distinct users
Month-to-date count of unique users who have been gratified (received benefits) through the UPI SuperCash program
Cashback program related to UPI transactions offering rewards through various redemption types including coins, goldcoins, and direct UPI transfers
Type of SuperCash redemption method including coins, goldcoins, UPI, and other payment methods
